author: stas
msg: mod_perl 2.0 build always knows the right httpd location (and
optionally apxs). so allow overriding to all but 'httpd' and 'apxs'

author: gozer
msg: Hard-code listen directive to 127.0.0.1, solving problems for people
with IPv4 & IPv6 address until a better solution is found
